alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Stillwater, west central Big Horn, Carbon, southwestern Musselshell, western Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 229 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong wind gusts ahead of thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Roundup to 22 miles east of Ryegate to 8 miles west of Joliet to 10 miles west of Red Lodge. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Red Lodge, Columbus, Roundup, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Lockwood, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Absarokee, Broadview, Lavina, Bearcreek, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife and Edgar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for south central and central Montana.
